answers.answer: i'd still go & get it checked out, any chest pain should bet checked.

The chest pain of a heart attack has been known to come and go. It did with me.  I waited about 4 days with my first one thinking I was being silly about it.  It's worth a trip to the doctor to have checked out.  Then again, there can be missed or skipped beats in a healthy heart.  But it is a better idea to know what is causing your missed beats and chest pains.  Take care, Ally

question: I have some weird heard beats along with some dizziness.  I can feel my heartbeat fast when I am asleep and sometimes I do not feel my heartbeat at all.  Its scares me and it feels like my heart stopped but I know its beating, I just can hardly feel it.  Have had chest pains for 3 days but they go away so I doubt its something alarming.  Have not seen a doctor because since it goes away and comes back, maybe its just something I am doing.  I have had weird heart beats since I was younger but the EKG would come out normal.  My family does have a history of Diabetes, high blood pressure, thyroid and heart diseas.  Got checked in May and was clear of all those although my blood pressure was borderline high.  Would you know what this weird heartbeat may be?
title: Weird Heart Beats along with Dizziness.
